TEI.2.document_title: M B Nuckols to J E B Austin, 03-xx-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. B. Austin in account with W. B. Nuckols. March —, 1829. Price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 199

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. B. Austin in account with W. B. Nuckols. March —, 1829. Price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*James B. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1829">1829.*/date_mentioned* To *person_mentioned*M B Nuckols */person_mentioned* Dr*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-xx-1829">March. */date_mentioned* To one pot Rack-------------------------------2.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-xx-1829">"*/date_mentioned* one small pot---------1.12 1/2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-xx-1829">" */date_mentioned* one pair pot Hoocks--------- .75*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-xx-1829">"*/date_mentioned* one piggin-------- .50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-xx-1829">"*/date_mentioned* one Griddle---------1.50*/p*
*p*$6.37 1/2*/p*
*/div1*
